sdesc: The C major scale consists of the notes C, D, E, F, G, A, and B.
notes: C, D, E, F, G, A, B

sdesc: The C minor scale consists of the notes C, D, E♭, F, G, A♭, and B♭.
notes: C, D, E♭, F, G, A♭, B♭

sdesc: The D major scale consists of the notes D, E, F♯, G, A, B, and C♯.
notes: D, E, F♯, G, A, B, C♯

sdesc: The D minor scale consists of the notes D, E, F, G, A, B♭, and C.
notes: D, E, F, G, A, B♭, C

sdesc: The E major scale consists of the notes E, F♯, G♯, A, B, C♯, and D♯.
notes: E, F♯, G♯, A, B, C♯, D♯

sdesc: The E minor scale consists of the notes E, F♯, G, A, B, C, and D.
notes: E, F♯, G, A, B, C, D

sdesc: The F major scale consists of the notes F, G, A, A♯, C, D, and E.
notes: F, G, A, A♯, C, D, E

sdesc: The F minor scale consists of the notes F, G, A♭, A, C, D♭, and E♭.
notes: F, G, A♭, A, C, D♭, E♭

sdesc: The G major scale consists of the notes G, A, B, C, D, E, and F♯.
notes: G, A, B, C, D, E, F♯

sdesc: The G minor scale consists of the notes G, A, B♭, C, D, E♭, and F.
notes: G, A, B♭, C, D, E♭, F

sdesc: The A major scale consists of the notes A, B, C♯, D, E, F♯, and G♯.
notes: A, B, C♯, D, E, F♯, G♯

sdesc: The A minor scale consists of the notes A, B, C, D, E, F, and G.
notes: A, B, C, D, E, F, G

sdesc: The B major scale consists of the notes B, C♯, D♯, E, F♯, G♯, and A♯.
The B minor scale consists of the notes B, C♯, D, E, F♯, G, and A.
notes: B, C♯, D, E, F♯, G, A
